title: Remove overly-green background styling from the Try Demo section

requirements.text: Update the Try Demo section styling to remove the overly-green / AI-looking background treatment and replace it with a neutral, government-style background consistent with the siteâ€™s muted graphite/off-white palette (minimal use of green accent). Apply this specifically in `frontend/src/components/TryDemoSection.tsx` without changing any existing copy or the demo launch URL.

quotes: where it says try demo the background I don't like it its too green to ai take it out

acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/components/TryDemoSection.tsx`, the section wrapper background is updated so it reads neutral (no noticeable green tint), while remaining consistent with the Option A government style (flat panels, minimal color).

Any green-accent-heavy styling within the Try Demo section (e.g., prominent green icon accents) is reduced or replaced with neutral foreground/muted styling so the section no longer feels 'too green'.
All user-facing text in the Try Demo section remains unchanged.
The demo launch link remains exactly `https://nexusforgeai.base44.app/Chat` and continues to open in a new tab.
No new gradients, glows, or decorative AI-style effects are introduced in the Try Demo section.

constraints: Do not change the demo URL (`https://nexusforgeai.base44.app/Chat`) or its behavior (new tab, noopener noreferrer).
Keep all existing English marketing copy in the Try Demo section unchanged.
nonGoals: Redesigning other sections beyond the Try Demo section.
Changing the content (prompts, disclaimer text) in `frontend/src/content/tryDemo.ts`.
Adding new demo flows, authentication, or backend changes.
